version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="ANCRegistration"> <ANCRegistration id="11" name="Reg-ANC"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <ancRegNumber/> <estDeliveryDate/> <height/> <gravida/> <parity/> <enroll/> <consent/> <ownership/> <phoneNumber/> <format/> <language/> <dayOfWeek/> <timeOfDay/> <howLearned/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>registerANCMother-jf</formname> </ANCRegistration> </xf:instance> <xf:instance id="format"> <dynamiclist> <item id="PERS_VOICE" parent="PERSONAL"> <label>Voice</label> <value>PERS_VOICE</value> </item> <item id="PERS_TEXT" parent="PERSONAL"> <label>SMS</label> <value>PERS_TEXT</value> </item> <item id="HSE_VOICE" parent="HOUSEHOLD"> <label>Voice</label> <value>HSE_VOICE</value> </item> <item id="HSE_TEXT" parent="HOUSEHOLD"> <label>SMS</label> <value>HSE_TEXT</value> </item> <item id="PUB_VOICE" parent="PUBLIC"> <label>Voice</label> <value>PUB_VOICE</value> </item> </dynamiclist> </xf:instance> <xf:instance id="language"> <dynamiclist> <item id="en" parent="PERS_VOICE"> <label>English</label> <value>en</value> </item> <item id="kas" parent="PERS_VOICE"> <label>Kassim</label> <value>kas</value> </item> <item id="nan" parent="PERS_VOICE"> <label>Nankam</label> <value>nan</value> </item> <item id="en" parent="PERS_TEXT"> <label>English</label> <value>en</value> </item> <item id="en" parent="HSE_VOICE"> <label>English</label> <value>en</value> </item> <item id="kas" parent="HSE_VOICE"> <label>Kassim</label> <value>kas</value> </item> <item id="nan" parent="HSE_VOICE"> <label>Nankam</label> <value>nan</value> </item> <item id="en" parent="HSE_TEXT"> <label>English</label> <value>en</value> </item> <item id="en" parent="PUB_VOICE"> <label>English</label> <value>en</value> </item> <item id="kas" parent="PUB_VOICE"> <label>Kassim</label> <value>kas</value> </item> <item id="nan" parent="PUB_VOICE"> <label>Nankam</label> <value>nan</value> </item> </dynamiclist> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date entered is in the future" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="ancRegNumber" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/ancRegNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="estDeliveryDate" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/estDeliveryDate" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 60 and . <= 200" id="height" message="Value out of range: must be between 60 and 200" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/height" required="true()" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 20" id="gravida" message="Value out of range: must be between 1 and 20" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/gravida" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 0 and . <= 20" id="parity" message="Value out of range: must be between 0 and 20" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/parity" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="enroll" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/enroll" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="consent" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/consent" relevant="/ANCRegistration/enroll = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="ownership" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/ownership" relevant="/ANCRegistration/consent = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="phoneNumber" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/phoneNumber" relevant="/ANCRegistration/ownership = 'PERSONAL' or /ANCRegistration/ownership = 'HOUSEHOLD'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="format" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/format" relevant="/ANCRegistration/consent = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="language" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/language" relevant="/ANCRegistration/consent = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="dayOfWeek" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/dayOfWeek" relevant="/ANCRegistration/format = 'PERS_VOICE' or /ANCRegistration/format = 'HSE_VOICE'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="timeOfDay" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/timeOfDay" relevant="/ANCRegistration/format = 'PERS_VOICE' or /ANCRegistration/format = 'HSE_VOICE'" required="true()" type="xsd:time" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="howLearned" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/howLearned" relevant="/ANCRegistration/consent = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/ANCRegistration/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Reg. date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="ancRegNumber"> <xf:label>ANC Reg No</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="estDeliveryDate"> <xf:label>EDD</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="height"> <xf:label>Height (cm)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="gravida"> <xf:label>Gravida</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="parity"> <xf:label>Parity</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="enroll"> <xf:label>Join Mobile Midwife?</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="consent"> <xf:label>Consent?</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="ownership"> <xf:label>Phone ownership</xf:label> <xf:item id="PERSONAL"> <xf:label>Personal phone</xf:label> <xf:value>PERSONAL</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="HOUSEHOLD"> <xf:label>Household phone</xf:label> <xf:value>HOUSEHOLD</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="PUBLIC"> <xf:label>Public phone</xf:label> <xf:value>PUBLIC</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="phoneNumber"> <xf:label>Phone number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="format"> <xf:label>Message format</xf:label> <xf:itemset nodeset="instance('format')/item[@parent=instance('ANCRegistration')/ownership]"> <xf:label ref="label"/> <xf:value ref="value"/> </xf:itemset> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="language"> <xf:label>Message language</xf:label> <xf:itemset nodeset="instance('language')/item[@parent=instance('ANCRegistration')/format]"> <xf:label ref="label"/> <xf:value ref="value"/> </xf:itemset> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="dayOfWeek"> <xf:label>Day of week to receive messages</xf:label> <xf:item id="monday"> <xf:label>Monday</xf:label> <xf:value>monday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="tuesday"> <xf:label>Tuesday</xf:label> <xf:value>tuesday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="wednesday"> <xf:label>Wednesday</xf:label> <xf:value>wednesday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="thursday"> <xf:label>Thursday</xf:label> <xf:value>thursday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="friday"> <xf:label>Friday</xf:label> <xf:value>friday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="saturday"> <xf:label>Saturday</xf:label> <xf:value>saturday</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="sunday"> <xf:label>Sunday</xf:label> <xf:value>sunday</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="timeOfDay"> <xf:label>Time of day to receive messages</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="howLearned"> <xf:label>How learned of Mobile Midwife</xf:label> <xf:item id="GHS_NURSE"> <xf:label>GHS Nurse</xf:label> <xf:value>GHS_NURSE</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="MOTECH_FIELD_AGENT"> <xf:label>MoTeCH field agent</xf:label> <xf:value>MOTECH_FIELD_AGENT</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="FRIEND"> <xf:label>Friend</xf:label> <xf:value>FRIEND</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="POSTERS_ADS"> <xf:label>Posters/ads</xf:label> <xf:value>POSTERS_ADS</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="RADIO"> <xf:label>Radio</xf:label> <xf:value>RADIO</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
